I20050222

1. create an xml file and open it using XML Editor
2. on the design page, drag and drop an element to the last line
3. get the following NPE in the log

Looks like a problem with the XML editor DND support.

Rich, can you take a look.  This sounds familiar.  Have we fixed this already 
(perhaps in another code stream)?

Created an attachment (id=19525)
Fix for this bugzilla.

This patch no longer seems to want to 'apply' itself to the version that's 
in HEAD. 

Can you please re-open with new patch, if this is still a problem? 

(And, once you do, assign to me or Craig to be sure we notice to apply it)
The patch has already been applied to head (on 2005-04-05).
Changed Version field given new release numbering.
Reopening, in order to put into a valid closed state as remind is now deprecated, and closed, remind, does not make much sense.

Resolving as won't fix, as these had previously been closed out, if this is incorrect, please provide more data and reopen.

Thanks,
